params.name: timespan
params.description: Specifies the maximum amount of time, in seconds, to wait for code inside this tag to execute.

params.name: ontimeout
params.description:
A closure function (UDF) with the following signature:

`function( timespan ) { }`

params.name: onerror
params.description:
A closure function (UDF) with the following signature:

`function( error ) { }`

params.name: forcestop
params.description: Force the thread to stop once the execution exceeds the allowed timespan
